actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO public.employee (
	name,
	title,
	email_id,
	personal_email_id,
	gender,
	birthday,
	start_date,
	status,
	primary_department,
	secondary_department,
	manager_email,
	employee_id,
	location_country,
	location_state,
	location_city,
	location_pin_code,
	delivery_address,
	nationality,
	area_of_expertise,
	horizontal,
	salary_portal,
	onboarding_buddy_email_id,
	phone_number,
	country_code
)
VALUES (
	'{{emp_nameCopy.text}}',
	'{{emp_titleCopy.text}}',
	'{{emp_emailCopy.text}}',
	'{{emp_personal_emailCopy.text}}',
	'{{emp_genderCopy.selectedOptionValue}}',
	'{{moment(emp_birthdayCopy.formattedDate).format('DD/MM/YYYY')}}',
	'{{moment(emp_startdateCopy.formattedDate).format('DD/MM/YYYY')}}',
	'{{emp_statusCopy.selectedOptionValue}}',
	'{{emp_primary_podCopy.selectedOptionValue}}',
	'{{emp_otherpodsCopy.selectedOptionValues.toString()}}',
	'{{emp_managerCopy.selectedOptionValue}}',
	{{emp_idCopy.text || null}},
	'{{emp_countryCopy.selectedOptionValue}}',
	'{{emp_stateCopy.text}}',
	'{{emp_cityCopy.text}}',
	'{{emp_pincodeCopy.text}}',
	'{{emp_addressCopy.text}}',
	'{{emp_nationalityCopy.text}}',
	'{{emp_expertiseCopy.selectedOptionValue}}',
	'{{emp_horizontalCopy.selectedOptionValue}}',
	'{{emp_salary_portalCopy.selectedOptionValue}}',
	'{{emp_buddyCopy.selectedOptionValue}}',
	'{{emp_phoneCopy.text.replace(' ', '')}}',
	'{{emp_phoneCopy.dialCode.replace('+', '')}}'
);
